fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source

Class AbstractProjectsListMojo.AbstractProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source.AbstractProjectsListMojo.AbstractProject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExistingBWProjectsListMojo.BWProject, MavenProjectsListMojo.MavenProject
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractProjectsListMojo

    public abstract static class AbstractProjectsListMojo.AbstractProject
extends java.lang.Object

    A project can be either:

    • an existing Maven project defined by a POM
    • an existing BW project that is to be mavenized (Maven properties such as groupId, artifactId & version will be guessed from provided values)
    Concrete inner-classes will define the properties according to these profiles.
